site.name: Saxho
site.description: Innovation consulting firm. From idea to success.

home.hero_subtitle: Everyone intuitively knows that innovation matters. Creating new products, new services. Standing out. Staying adapted to a constantly changing environment. Seizing opportunities as they arise.
home.paradox_title: But putting it into practice is harder than it seems.
home.paradox_dilemma: How do you reconcile unprecedented initiatives, whose outcomes remain uncertain, with the long-term execution of regular business — the only source of revenue that keeps a company viable?
home.paradox_tension: How do you invest in the future when all eyes are on the present?
home.paradox_inertia: Companies are so deeply involved in day-to-day operations that they no longer have the perspective needed to innovate.
home.resolution_subtitle: An accessible range of services, tailored to each challenge. One-off or structural, à la carte. From idea to success.
home.ecosystem_text: Saxho leverages an ecosystem of expertise: project management, the specialty of our subsidiaries IXILA and PM Side, is a powerful lever for driving innovation.
home.cta_title: Ready to turn your ideas into success?
home.climber_aria_label: Illustration of a climber reaching for 5 holds representing our services

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Innovation as a profession. Projects as a method.
about.description: Discover Saxho's story, our ecosystem and our approach to innovation consulting.
about.history_p1: Saxho was born in 2011 from a simple conviction: innovation is not a luxury reserved for large corporations — it's a vital necessity for any business that wants to last.
about.history_p2: The group was built progressively, creating an ecosystem of complementary skills around project management and strategic consulting.
about.history_p3: Today, Saxho positions itself as a firm specializing in innovation support. "From idea to success" is not just a tagline — it's a method, a conviction, a commitment.
about.ecosystem_intro: One group, three entities, one shared vision: turning ideas into concrete achievements.
about.eco_saxho_text: Strategic vision and innovation support. The parent company that sets the course.
about.eco_ixila_text: Project management consulting, PMO, Microsoft Project and SharePoint expertise. Operational excellence.
about.eco_pmside_text: SaaS publisher of Microsoft Project Server hosting solutions. Tools serving the method.
about.ecosystem_synergy: Project management, the specialty of our subsidiaries, is a powerful lever for driving innovation. The Saxho ecosystem combines strategic vision with operational excellence.
about.value1_text: Stepping back is essential for innovation. A fresh eye sees what habit conceals.
about.value2_text: Innovation is not a matter of chance. Rigorous methods turn creativity into results.
about.value3_text: Concrete results, not theory. Every intervention aims for measurable and rapid impact.
about.value4_text: Every company has its own pace. Support adapts to the level of maturity and available resources.

services.title: Our services
services.intro: À la carte services for every dimension of your innovation journey.
services.page_subtitle: Every company intuitively knows that innovation is vital. But how do you invest in the future while executing the present? Saxho offers a range of à la carte services, tailored to every challenge.
services.s1_short: An outside perspective to imagine solutions
services.s1_problem: Companies, absorbed by day-to-day operations, lose the perspective needed to identify solutions.
services.s1_solution: An outside perspective to imagine innovations, improvements, new products or services. Without preconceptions, without internal constraints.
services.s1_audience: Companies that want to evolve but don't know where to start.
services.s2_short: Structured sessions to surface the right ideas
services.s2_problem: Good ideas are often there, within teams — but unexpressed, unstructured, unexploited.
services.s2_solution: Facilitation of in-house ideation sessions, with proven methodology to foster the emergence of new ideas and concepts.
services.s2_audience: Companies that want to mobilize the collective intelligence of their teams.
services.s3_problem: Innovation remains sporadic, never systematic. When it happens, it's by accident.
services.s3_solution: Support to establish a continuous innovation flow, integrated into the company's normal operations. Well-articulated processes that work with the rest of the organization.
services.s3_audience: Companies that want a lasting and structured innovation culture.
services.s4_problem: Organizational inertia, internal red tape, and daily concerns hold back innovative projects.
services.s4_solution: Saxho takes charge of facilitating and leading the project in an externalized framework, free from all constraints. Task force mode. The project remains the client's property, with a strict legal framework.
services.s4_audience: Companies with a specific innovation project to accelerate.
services.s5_problem: Ideas are not lacking — what's missing is the framework to turn them into reality.
services.s5_solution: Saxho develops its own ideas, brings together skills and collaborators, and leads the project through to market launch. The project is then transferred to a dedicated entity.
services.s5_audience: Contributors who want to participate in innovative projects, and investors who want to fund innovation.
services.s5_open: External parties can contribute skills or investment.
services.cta_final_text: Whatever your level of maturity, there is support tailored to you.
